Package com.company

Class Plant

java.lang.Object
com.company.Elements
com.company.Character
com.company.Plant
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barrier, Bomb, Shooter, SunPlant
public class Plant
extends Character
This is Plant class. this class extends Character The different types of plants such as ShooterPlant ,... extends this class. The cost fields means that the number of suns that we need to use this type of plant.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahdi Rahmani & Nami Modarresi

  • Constructor Details

    • Plant

      public Plant​(int[] position, int cost, int HP, java.lang.String elementPath, GameState gameState)
      This is the constructor of this class. Creat a new Plant with a given position , cost , HP , elementPath The speed of each plant is 0 and dont move
      Parameters:
      position - the x & y coordinates
      cost - the cost of this plant
      HP - The health point
      elementPath - the path of element gif or image
